title.narrative: OUTPUT 2.2: EDUCATION SYSTEM HAS IMPROVED CAPACITY TO PROVIDE QUALITY LEARNINGS

description.narrative: The education system has improved capacity to provide quality learning to children and adolescents., which contributes to Learning Outcomes, Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid), Skills Development, Skills Development (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, children and adolescents, including those in disadvantaged areas and/or affected by emergencies, are increasingly attending formal and non-formal education in an environment that promotes the acquisition of skills for their integration into social and economic life.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The education system has improved capacity to provide quality learning to children and adolescents.

description.narrative: L'appui technique de l'UNICEF au Ministère de l'Education a permis l'intégration dans le curriculum révisé de l'enseignement fondamental de compétences essentielles et d'éléments de formation au numérique, ce qui va accroitre non seulement la qualité de l'éducation dispensée mais aussi l'adaptabilité des élèves au marché du travail et ainsi que leur employabilité. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2020
